com.vmware.appliance.recovery.backup

Interface Job

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JobTypes, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JobStub

    public interface Job
extends Service, JobTypes
    The Job interface provides methods to be performed on a backup job.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.vmware.appliance.recovery.backup.JobTypes

        JobTypes.BackupJobStatus, JobTypes.BackupRequest, JobTypes.BackupRestoreProcessState, JobTypes.LocalizableMessage, JobTypes.LocationType, JobTypes.ReturnResult, JobTypes.ReturnStatus

        Cancel the backup job.

        BackupJobStatus Structure
        Throws:
        NotFound - if backup associated with id does not exist.
